abstract: The Fed said regional economies in most parts of the country are on the mend, largely because home sales are rebounding and manufacturers are stirring back to life.
snippet: The Fed said regional economies in most parts of the country are on the mend, largely because home sales are rebounding and manufacturers are stirring back to life.
lead_paragraph: Regional economies in most parts of the country are on the mend, largely because home sales are rebounding and factories and manufacturers are stirring back to life, the Federal Reserve said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Beige Book Sees Signs That Growth Is Stirring
headline.print_headline: Beige Book Sees Signs That Growth Is Stirring
